subject: You are approved!  Wed, 30 May 2007 23:39:06 -0500
body:
Hey Home0wner,

Tired of paying such high interest rates?  

Why NOT Refiinance us with lower rate?  


Act now on your loan pre-approval. Please respond A.S.A.P

http://1url.org/go/1h5vx

Julian Dubois
Loan Central
